name: Cupid Pitch
text:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
If this card is Synchro Summoned: Increase or reduce its Level by the Level of the Tuner used as material for its Synchro Summon. Gains ATK equal to its Level x 400. If this Synchro Summoned card is sent to the GY as Synchro Material: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to Level of the Synchro Monster that used this card as material x 100, and if you do, you can add 1 Level 8 or lower monster with 600 DEF from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Cupid Pitch" once per turn.
